heroTitle.default:
A Space to Breathe
A Space to Belong

heroSubtitle.default: Over 80% open greens, enveloped by quiet avenues and timeless design.

overviewTitle.default:
Crafted for Those Who
Value the Calm Within

overviewContent.default:
On 5.6 acres of resort-style landscaped greens rise five serene towers, home to 456 residences designed with care and precision.

Every home at Ashtech Presidential Towers is an orchestration of light, proportion, and privacy, designed for those who seek permanence over display. Expansive decks open to the sky, while shaded walkways replace traffic and noise below.

Here, craftsmanship becomes a quiet companion. Each of these premium 3 & 4 BHK apartments in Greater Noida - West, speaks to a life refined in detail and defined by time.

Project Designed, Landscape designed by International Architect- Studio Symbiosis- London

architectureTitle.default: Architecture Shaped by the Elements of Nature

architectureDescription.default: The architecture of Ashtech Presidential Towers, Greater Noida - West, draws inspiration from presidential living and also nature's four elements, expressed through timeless geometry, natural materials, and serene spaces that feel deeply personal.

architectureSunText.default: East-facing layouts, curved glass balustrades, and deep sundecks that receive every sunrise in quiet warmth.

architectureAirText.default: Cross-ventilation through every home, open corridors, and layered terraces that invite movement and breath into the architecture.

architectureWaterText.default: Reflective water features, cascading elements, and aquatic landscaping that bring tranquility and fluidity to the environment.

architectureEarthText.default: Natural stone finishes, grounded forms, and native landscaping that connect every residence to the terrain beneath.

experiencesTitle.default: A Life Composed for Grace and Grandeur

experiencesDescription.default: Every space at Ashtech Presidential Towers, Greater Noida - West, has been envisioned to create balance between solitude and togetherness, wellness and celebration, simplicity and splendour. Across seventy thousand square feet, experiences unfold with quiet precision.

locationTitle.default: A Rare Balance of Access, Convenience and Calm

locationDescription.default: Set in Sector 12, Greater Noida - West, the address combines convenience with quietude, close to key business corridors, airports, and lifestyle avenues.

Art of Perfection

default: Italian marble flooring in the living, dining, and kitchen
TQ Cert quality assurance at every phase
Natural light planning for lower energy load
Materials chosen for endurance & environmental harmony

aboutTitle.default: A Legacy Etched in Precision and Purpose

aboutDescription.default: For over thirty years, the Ashtech Group has embodied engineering excellence and enduring quality, standing as a diversified force within India's construction and infrastructure landscape. Each milestone reflects a pursuit of perfection and a belief that true strength lies in detail. Every element of Ashtech Presidential Towers bears the imprint of that ethos audited by TQ Cert, executed by master craftsmen, and envisioned to remain timeless through generations.
